greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, A168258 * the diagonalized variant of A168359
comment: Sum of n-th row terms = rightmost term of next row.
Row sum ratios tend (conjecture) to phi^2, 2.6180339...(Cf. A168259).
formula: Let M = triangle A168258 and Q = the diagonalized variant of M's eigensequence
such that Q's rightmost diagonal = A168259 prefaced with a 1: (1, 1, 2, 6,...).
Triangle A168260 = M * Q as infinite lower triangular matrices.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
